mapper.sql: t_user_detail.nickname as userDetailNickname, t_user_detail.headicon as userDetailHeadicon, t_user.id as userId, t_user.phone as userPhone, t_user.email as userEmail, t_goods_sku.id as goodsSkuId, t_goods_sku.goods_id as goodsSkuGoodsId, t_goods_pic.pic_url as goodsPicPicUrl, t_goods_cart.quantity as goodsCartQuantity, t_goods_cart.create_time as goodsCartCreateTime, t_goods_cart.update_time as goodsCartUpdateTime
mapper.select:
select
from t_user_detail, t_goods_sku, t_goods_pic, t_goods_cart, t_user where t_user.id = #{id} and t_user.id = t_user_detail.id and t_user.id = t_goods_cart.user_id and t_goods_cart.goods_sku_id = t_goods_sku.id and t_goods_sku.pic_id = t_goods_pic.id

select
from t_user_detail, t_goods_sku, t_goods_pic, t_goods_cart, t_user where t_user.id = t_user_detail.id and t_user.id = t_goods_cart.user_id and t_goods_cart.goods_sku_id = t_goods_sku.id and t_goods_sku.pic_id = t_goods_pic.id order by t_user.update_time desc, t_user.create_time desc

select
from t_user_detail, t_goods_sku, t_goods_pic, t_goods_cart, t_user
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_user.update_time desc, t_user.create_time desc
select count(*) from t_user_detail, t_goods_sku, t_goods_pic, t_goods_cart, t_user
